executable.title: Coregister B-Values
executable.description: This step should be performed after converting DWI scans from DICOM to NRRD format. This program will register all gradients in a NRRD diffusion weighted 4D vector image (moving image) to a specified index in a fixed image. It also supports co-registration with a T2 weighted image or field map in the same plane as the DWI data. The fixed image for the registration should be a b0 image. A mutual information metric cost function is used for the registration because of the differences in signal intensity as a result of the diffusion gradients. The full affine allows the registration procedure to correct for eddy current distortions that may exist in the data. If the eddyCurrentCorrection is enabled, relaxationFactor (0.25) and maximumStepSize (0.1) should be adjusted.

parameters.label: Input Image Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the diffusion tensor images to fit

image.name: movingVolume
image.description: Required: input moving image file name. In order to register gradients within a scan to its first gradient, set the movingVolume and fixedVolume as the same image.
image.label: Moving Image Volume

image.name: fixedVolume
image.description: Required: input fixed image file name. It is recommended that this image should either contain or be a b0 image.
image.label: Fixed Image Volume

integer.name: fixedVolumeIndex
integer.description: Index in the fixed image for registration. It is recommended that this image should be a b0 image.
integer.label: Fixed Image Index

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: name of output NRRD file containing moving images individually resampled and fit to the specified fixed image index.
image.label: Output Image Volume

transform.name: outputTransform
transform.description: Registration 3D transforms concatenated in a single output file. There are no tools that can use this, but can be used for debugging purposes.
transform.label: Output Transform

parameters.label: Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Input registration parameters controlling the fit

boolean.name: eddyCurrentCorrection
boolean.description: Flag to perform eddy current corection in addition to motion correction (recommended)
boolean.label: Eddy Current Correction

integer.name: numberOfIterations
integer.description: Number of iterations in each 3D fit
integer.label: Number Of Iterations

integer.name: numberOfSpatialSamples
integer.description: The number of voxels sampled for mutual information computation. Increase this for a slower, more careful fit. NOTE that it is suggested to use samplingPercentage instead of this option. However, if set, it overwrites the samplingPercentage option.
integer.label: Number Of Samples

double.name: samplingPercentage
double.label: Percentage Of Samples
double.description: This is a number in (0.0,1.0] interval that shows the percentage of the input fixed image voxels that are sampled for mutual information computation. Increase this for a slower, more careful fit. You can also limit the sampling focus with ROI masks and ROIAUTO mask generation. The default is to use approximately 5% of voxels (for backwards compatibility 5% ~= 500000/(256*256*256)). Typical values range from 1% for low detail images to 20% for high detail images.

float.name: relaxationFactor
float.description: Fraction of gradient from Jacobian to attempt to move in each 3D fit step (adjust when eddyCurrentCorrection is enabled; suggested value = 0.25)
float.label: Relaxation Factor

float.name: maximumStepSize
float.description: Maximum permitted step size to move in each 3D fit step (adjust when eddyCurrentCorrection is enabled; suggested value = 0.1)
float.label: Maximum Step Size

float.name: minimumStepSize
float.description: Minimum required step size to move in each 3D fit step without converging -- decrease this to make the fit more exacting
float.label: Minimum Step Size

float.name: spatialScale
float.description: How much to scale up changes in position compared to unit rotational changes in radians -- decrease this to put more rotation in the fit
float.label: Translation Scale

integer.name: debugLevel
integer.label: Debug option
integer.description: Display debug messages, and produce debug intermediate results. 0=OFF, 1=Minimal, 10=Maximum debugging.

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
